title: Research Project I
requirements: For students in Human Biology Stream only; Prerequisite: MEDN3050/3051, 3060/3061, 3070/3071 and 3080/3081.
description: In this course, students are required to undertake an in-depth research project under the supervision of a faculty member from the School of Biomedical Sciences. Research work should be started during the summer vacation preceding the final year of attendance. The literature review, design and results of the research project will be presented at a seminar at the end of the first term of the final year of attendance.

title: Research Project II
requirements: For students in Human Biology Stream only; Prerequisite: MEDN3050/3051, 3060/3061, 3070/3071, 3080/3081 and BMJC4411.
description: In this course, students are required to undertake an in-depth research project under the supervision of a faculty member from the School of Biomedical Sciences. Research work should be started during the summer vacation preceding the final year of attendance. The literature review, design and results of the research project will be presented at a seminar at the end of the first term of the final year of attendance.
